description: Starts the workflow when MailerLite events occur

properties.name: Subscriber Added Throught Webform
properties.description: Fired when a subscriber is added though a form

properties.name: Subscriber Added to Group
properties.description: Fired when a subscriber is added to a group

properties.name: Subscriber Bounced
properties.description: Fired when an email address bounces

properties.name: Subscriber Complained
properties.description: Fired when subscriber marks a campaign as a spam

properties.name: Subscriber Created
properties.description: Fired when a new subscriber is added to an account

properties.name: Subscriber Removed From Group
properties.description: Fired when a subscriber is removed from a group

properties.name: Subscriber Unsubscribe
properties.description: Fired when a subscriber becomes unsubscribed

properties.name: Subscriber Updated
properties.description: Fired when any of the subscriber's custom fields are updated
